data.message: My question is, how do I contact Facebook directly? I advertise on FB & have an issue with my business page and have no way of contacting Facebook! Help!

replies.message: Hi Jimmy. For questions regarding your business Page, please reach out to our team at: http://bit.ly/29OBWhs. Thanks. -Rey

I still have yet to resolve my issue. I Cannot contact anyone or email anyone at Facebook! Why is that? I pay on average $600 a month advertising on FB, I should at a minimum be able to email you guys. Not good business not being able to contact your Advertiser!

Facebook  

My profile has a block on it due to some graphing bug issue that you all have going on. Apparently this is a known issue that you all have yet to fix, I can't do anything until 8:56 PM. I want this block removed.

My iPhone 5s does not contain any viruses. I have not knowingly transmitted any viruses. I'm also going to send you a screenshot. My next step is to send all of this to the media. 

It seems as if when you guys know that you're at fault, you go out of your way to ignore individuals. I'm taking screenshots of all of these interactions. You've had ample time to correct this issue, yet you continue to ignore me.
$600 a month, does that get you real traffic? I'd charge half that and get you as much traffic.
Facebook I still have not been able to resolve my issue. I'm a paying customer and need assistance from somebody at Facebook for my business page. Can someone please get back to me?
